summary.incident:
Gustavo Sa (Famalicao) leaps to connect
with a delightful cross and places his sweet
header inside the left post. The goalkeeper
had no chance to make a save.

Morten Hjulmand (Sporting Lisbon) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Antonio
Nobre ignores the protests.

Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) receives
a killer pass and scores a great goal after
finding the back of the net with a simple
finish!

Antonio Nobre shows a yellow card to Goncalo
Inacio (Sporting Lisbon) for a tough tackle.

Gustavo Sa (Famalicao) fouls his opponent
and receives a yellow card from the referee,
but he is clearly not happy with the decision.

Celebrations are cut short for Sporting
CP as the referee indicates NO GOAL after
the VAR review shows it was offside!

Gil Dias (Famalicao) sees a yellow card
from Antonio Nobre after he sent one of
the opposing players to the ground.

The game is interrupted because of a yellow
card that is shown to Pedro Bondo (Famalicao).

A yellow card for a tackle by Marcos Pena
(Famalicao). Antonio Nobre doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Goal! Luis Suarez (Sporting Lisbon) beautifully
controls a strongly hit pass from Pedro
Goncalves inside the box. He cuts inside
his marker and rifles the ball into the
right side of the goal. 1:2.

Substitution. Fotis Ioannidis (Sporting
Lisbon) replaces Giorgi Kochorashvili.

Here is a change. Ricardo Mangas is going
off and Rui Borges gives the last tactical
orders to Maximiliano Araujo (Sporting Lisbon).

Substitution. Pedro Bondo makes way for
Antoine Joujou (Famalicao).

Substitution. Marcos Pena is replaced by
Tommie Van de Looi (Famalicao).

A substitution has been made. Gustavo Sa
is replaced by Pedro Santos (Famalicao).

Hugo Oliveira decides to make a substitution.
Simon Elisor will be replaced by Yassir
Zabiri (Famalicao).

Rui Borges prepares a substitution. Pedro
Goncalves is replaced by Alisson Santos
(Sporting Lisbon).

A substitution has been made. Luis Suarez
goes off and Joao Simoes (Sporting Lisbon)
comes on.

Mathias De Amorim comes off the pitch to
be replaced by Umar Abubakar (Famalicao).

The foul by Maximiliano Araujo (Sporting
Lisbon) is worthy of a card and a yellow
is duly shown by Antonio Nobre.

Rui Borges has decided to make a change.
Eduardo Quaresma (Sporting Lisbon) replaces
Trincao.

Joao Aurelio (Nacional) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Luis Miguel Branco Godinho
didn't think twice about pulling it out
of his pocket.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Samu (FC Porto) low into the left of
the net, giving goalkeeper Lucas Franca
no chance!

Here is a change. Alan Varela is going off
and Francesco Farioli gives the last tactical
orders to Nehuen Perez (FC Porto).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Gabri Veiga (FC Porto)
will replace Rodrigo Mora.

Substitution. Francisco Moura is replaced
by Zaidu (FC Porto).

Stephen Eustaquio (FC Porto) comes onto
the pitch after Nehuen Perez signals to
the bench that he cannot continue any longer
after picking up an injury.

Tiago Margarido has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Witi (Nacional) replacing
Pablo Ruan.

Chiheb Labidi (Nacional) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Luis Miguel
Branco Godinho ignores the protests.

That will be all from Liziero who is being
replaced by the fresh legs of Filipe Soares
(Nacional).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Joel Silva (Nacional) comes
onto the pitch for Chiheb Labidi.

Luis Miguel Branco Godinho shows a yellow
card to Gabri Veiga (FC Porto) for a tough
tackle.

The expression of the referee Luis Miguel
Branco Godinho is crystal clear. This behaviour
won't be tolerated. Samu (FC Porto) is shown
a yellow card.

Paulinho Boia goes off the pitch and Lucas
Joao (Nacional) comes on.

Francesco Farioli has decided to substitute
Samu and he is replaced by Deniz Gul (FC
Porto).

Ze Vitor (Nacional) gets booked for the
first time in this match.

Today's referee Luis Miguel Branco Godinho
rightly decides to book Leo Santos (Nacional)
for his harsh tackle.

Gabriel Silva (Santa Clara) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Joao Pinheiro
had an easy-decision to make.

Paulo Victor (Santa Clara) is literally
asking for a yellow card with his behaviour.
The referee agrees and books him.

Bruno Lage has decided to substitute Tomas
Araujo and he is replaced by Gianluca Prestianni
(Benfica).

Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica) picked up
a yellow card for saying too much to the
referee.

Goal! Vangelis Pavlidis (Benfica) fires
the rebound into the bottom right corner
after the ball breaks to him in the box.
The score is 1:0.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Gabriel Silva trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Diogo Calila
(Santa Clara).

Vasco Matos has decided to make a change.
Vinicius Lopes (Santa Clara) replaces Brenner.

It is time for a substitution. Leandro Barreiro
(Benfica) is on for Richard Rios.

Bruno Lage has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Henrique Araujo (Benfica) replacing
Franjo Ivanovic.

The substitution has been made. Georgiy
Sudakov (Benfica) has replaced Andreas Schjelderup.

Substitution. Anthony Carter (Santa Clara)
has come on for Matheus Pereira.

Vasco Matos decides to make a substitution.
Serginho will be replaced by Luquinhas (Santa
Clara).

The referee signals a substitution. Pedro
Ferreira (Santa Clara) is brought on as
a substitute for Adriano Firmino.

GOAL! A terrible mistake leads to a goal.
The defender ends up losing possession,
allowing Vinicius Lopes (Santa Clara) to
pick up the ball before slotting it into
the back of the net to make it 1:1.

What was Gorby (Braga) thinking? He will
not get away with that. The referee shows
him a yellow card.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Clayton (Rio Ave) low into the left of
the net, giving goalkeeper Lukas Hornicek
no chance!

Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the
opponent which has gifted a chance to Roger
(Braga), who rolls the ball into the back
of the net from close range. 1:1.

Goal! A precise cut back on the goal line
from Andre Luiz finds Clayton (Rio Ave)
right in front of goal, and he easily buries
the ball into the bottom left corner. 2:1.

Yellow card. Dario Spikic (Rio Ave) goes
into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.

Victor Gomez (Braga) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Andreas Ntoi (Rio Ave)
comes onto the pitch so that Dario Spikic
can be given a rest.

Brandon Aguilera Zamora (Rio Ave) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Carlos Vicens has decided to substitute
Fran Navarro and he is replaced by Amine
El Ouazzani (Braga).

It is time for a substitution. Joao Tome
(Rio Ave) is on for Marious Vrousai.

Sotiris Sylaidopoulos has decided to make
a change. Joao Novais (Rio Ave) replaces
Georgios Liavas.

That's the end of the game for Rodrigo Zalazar
Martinez (Braga), who is replaced by Gabri
Martinez.

Carlos Vicens has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Gabriel Moscardo (Braga) replacing
Gorby.

Cezary Miszta (Rio Ave) receives a yellow
card.

Sotiris Sylaidopoulos is forced to make
a change. Andre Luiz (Rio Ave) is not able
to carry on due to injury. He is replaced
by Marc Gual.

Sotiris Sylaidopoulos prepares a substitution.
Brandon Aguilera Zamora is replaced by Theofanis
Bakoulas (Rio Ave).

Gabri Martinez provides Amine El Ouazzani
(Braga) with a nice pass inside the box.
It allows him to finish with a low shot
into the middle of the goal.

Andreas Schjelderup (Benfica) scores as
he latches on to a pass inside the penalty
box and fires a perfect low strike, which
goes inside the left post.

Jose Bessa shows a yellow card to Amar Dedic
(Benfica) for his blatant foul.

Isaac James (Alverca) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

Amar Dedic (Benfica) makes a great solo
run and pulls the trigger from inside the
box, beating Mateus Oliveira with a strike
into the bottom left corner. He makes it
0:2.

Richard Rios (Benfica) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Jose Bessa had an easy-decision
to make.

Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) goes into the
book for a horrible tackle. A yellow card
is necessary in this case.

Sabit Abdulai (Alverca) has tested the patience
of referee Jose Bessa and goes into the
book for a previous late challenge.

Substitution. Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Andreas
Schjelderup walks off.

Here is a change. Franjo Ivanovic is going
off and Bruno Lage gives the last tactical
orders to Vangelis Pavlidis (Benfica).

Substitution. Richard Rios makes his way
off the pitch and Florentino (Benfica) comes
on as his replacement.

Substitution. Chissumba (Alverca) in, Isaac
James out.

That's the end of the game for Cedric Nuozzi,
who is replaced by Lincoln (Alverca).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Davy Gui (Alverca) comes
onto the pitch for Sabit Abdulai.

Amar Dedic (Benfica) seems to have forgotten
that he has already received a yellow card
as he is surprised when the referee shows
him a second one!

Problems for Custodio as Chiquinho (Alverca)
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Sandro Lima replaces
him.

It will be a substitution. Antonio Silva
(Benfica) is ready to enter the pitch as
Leandro Barreiro walks off.

Lincoln (Alverca) goes into the referee's
book for dissent.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Nabil Touaizi (Alverca) was quite harsh
and Jose Bessa didn't hesitate to show him
a yellow card.

Custodio prepares a substitution. Steven
Baseya is replaced by Goncalo Esteves (Alverca).

Goal! Davy Gui (Alverca) pounced on a loose
ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper
with a shot inside the right post. He makes
it 1:2.

Samuel Soares (Benfica) receives a yellow
card.

Enzo Barrenechea (Benfica) picks up a yellow
card.

Joao Goncalves shows the yellow card to
Jan Bednarek (FC Porto) for a heavy challenge.

Borja Sainz (FC Porto) picks up a yellow
card for a foul.

Zeno Debast (Sporting Lisbon) fouls his
opponent and receives a yellow card from
the referee, but he is clearly not happy
with the decision.

The foul by Luuk de Jong (FC Porto) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Joao Goncalves.

Today's match ends for Rodrigo Mora who
will be replaced by Pablo Rosario (FC Porto).

Francesco Farioli has decided to substitute
Francisco Moura and he is replaced by Zaidu
(FC Porto).

Luuk de Jong (FC Porto) receives a killer
pass, finds himself one-on-one with the
goalkeeper and coolly sends the ball into
the back of the net.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Georgios Vagiannidis (Sporting Lisbon) is
replacing Ivan Fresneda.

Rui Borges prepares a substitution. Geny
Catamo is replaced by Geovany Quenda (Sporting
Lisbon).

William Gomes (FC Porto) produces a moment
of pure magic and scores a spectacular goal
by striking the ball into the top left corner
of the net!

Samu (FC Porto) gets a yellow card, off
the field.

Goncalo Inacio (Sporting Lisbon) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Joao Goncalves
didn't think twice about pulling it out
of his pocket.

The referee signals a substitution. Conrad
Harder (Sporting Lisbon) is brought on as
a substitute for Giorgi Kochorashvili.

Today's referee Joao Goncalves rightly decides
to book Pablo Rosario (FC Porto) for his
harsh tackle.

William Gomes (FC Porto) just cannot continue
due to injury and has to be substituted.
Deniz Gul replaces him.

Nehuen Perez (FC Porto) was unlucky to score
an own goal attempting to intercept a cross.
Hang your head in shame!

A yellow card for a tackle by Georgios Vagiannidis
(Sporting Lisbon). Joao Goncalves doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Francesco Farioli decides to make a substitution.
Borja Sainz will be replaced by Dominik
Prpic (FC Porto).

Substitution. Luuk de Jong is replaced by
Samu (FC Porto).

Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) is not
able to continue due to his injury and will
be replaced by Alisson Santos.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez (Braga) low
into the left of the net, giving goalkeeper
Simao no chance!

Rafael Barbosa (AFS) finds some space inside
the box to meet a beautiful cross and with
a precise low drive puts the ball into the
bottom left corner.

Diego Duarte (AFS) scores! He latches on
to a pass and produces a perfect strike
from the edge of the box. The ball goes
into the bottom right corner and past the
goalkeeper.

Rafael Barbosa (AFS) is literally asking
for a yellow card with his behaviour. The
referee agrees and books him.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Guilherme Neiva (AFS)
will replace Tunde Akinsola.

Rafael Barbosa just cannot continue due
to injury and has to be substituted. Pedro
Lima (AFS) replaces him.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Amine El Ouazzani departs
the field of play to be replaced by Gabri
Martinez (Braga).

Carlos Vicens prepares a substitution. Roger
is replaced by Mario Dorgeles (Braga).
The booking goes to Diogo Spencer (AFS).

Jose Mota is forced to make a change. Diogo
Spencer is unable to continue due to injury,
Tiago Galletto (AFS) comes on.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Sandro Vidigal (Braga) is replacing Gustaf
Lagerbielke.

Carlos Vicens has decided to make a change.
Fran Navarro (Braga) replaces Pau Victor.

Tiago Galletto (AFS) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Joao Goncalves had an
easy-decision to make.

Fran Navarro (Braga) jumps for a cross and
plants a perfect header inside the left
post.

Today's match ends for Diego Duarte who
will be replaced by Nene (AFS).

Jose Mota decides to make a substitution.
Daniel Rivas will be replaced by Kiki (AFS).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Gorby (Braga) was quite harsh and Joao
Goncalves didn't hesitate to show him a
yellow card.

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Paulo
Oliveira (Braga).

Victor Froholdt feeds the ball through to
Borja Sainz (FC Porto), who picks up the
pass inside the box and quickly sends it
into the middle of the goal! The goalkeeper
was helpless. 1:0!

What a strike that is! William Gomes (FC
Porto) displays superb quick feet and dribbling
to score a goal! He swirls around the defending
players and gets to the edge of the box
before striking the ball. It heads towards
the bottom left corner and bounces in off
the post. What a superb goal!

William Gomes (FC Porto) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Sergio Guelho
had an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Alberto Costa takes aim and his effort
deflects off Nehuen Perez (FC Porto) to
beat the goalkeeper. 3:0.

Francesco Farioli has made a change at the
break. Francisco Moura has come on in place
of Zaidu (FC Porto).

Half-time substitution. Cassiano (Casa Pia)
will not participate anymore and Max Svensson
is coming on.

Alexandre Santana makes a half-time substitution.
Andre Geraldes (Casa Pia) comes on in place
of Fahem Benaissa-Yahia.

Victor Froholdt (FC Porto) commits a foul
and is shown a yellow card.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Korede Osundina as
he is replaced by Tiago Morais (Casa Pia).

Victor Froholdt (FC Porto) has picked up
an injury and is replaced by Stephen Eustaquio.

Substitution. William Gomes makes way for
Rodrigo Mora (FC Porto).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Jan Bednarek (FC Porto) was quite harsh
and Sergio Guelho didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted
a chance to a lurking Borja Sainz (FC Porto),
who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into
the net from close range. 4:0.

Substitution. Dominik Prpic (FC Porto) in,
Jan Bednarek out.

Alberto Costa (FC Porto) just cannot continue
due to injury and has to be substituted.
Jose Pedro replaces him.

Here is a change. Renato Nhaga is going
off and Alexandre Santana gives the last
tactical orders to Sebastian Perez (Casa
Pia).

Substitution. Jeremy Livolant makes his
way off the pitch and Miguel Sousa (Casa
Pia) comes on as his replacement.

It must be a yellow card. It is. Sebastian
Perez (Casa Pia) receives the caution after
an awful tackle.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) was quite
harsh and Anzhony Rodrigues didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

It's in the back of the net! Amar Dedic
slips the ball through to Franjo Ivanovic
(Benfica), and he darts into the box to
unleash a magnificent shot into the bottom
left corner. He makes it 1:0.

Miro (Tondela) is lucky to receive a yellow
card from the referee because he could easily
have been given a red card for his foul.

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing
from Fredrik Aursnes (Benfica). Andreas
Schjelderup plays a through ball and finds
Fredrik Aursnes (Benfica), who reacts quickly
to get in front of the goalpeeper and fire
a close-range shot into the top right corner.
It's now 2:0.

Substitution. Helder Tavares walks off the
pitch and Xabier Huarte (Tondela) comes
on as a substitute.

Ivo Vieira has decided to make a change.
Sphephelo Sithole (Tondela) replaces Joseph
Hodge.

Enzo Barrenechea (Benfica) gives the referee
no choice but to show him a yellow card.

Yefrei Rodriguez (Tondela) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Miro.

Bruno Lage decides to make a substitution.
Andreas Schjelderup will be replaced by
Kerem Akturkoglu (Benfica).

Substitution. Amar Dedic makes way for Gianluca
Prestianni (Benfica).

The manager makes a subsitution with Samuel
Dahl (Benfica) coming on for Rafael Obrador.

That's the end of the game for Pedro Maranhao,
who is replaced by Milama Moudjatovic (Tondela).

Bruno Lage prepares a substitution. Franjo
Ivanovic is replaced by Leandro Barreiro
(Benfica).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Juan Rodriguez trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Andre Ceitil
(Tondela).

Bruno Lage has decided to substitute Enzo
Barrenechea and he is replaced by Florentino
(Benfica).

Tiago Manso (Tondela) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Anzhony Rodrigues had
an easy-decision to make.

Goal! Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica) fires
the rebound into the top left corner after
the ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 3:0.

Goal! The ball is swung into the box from
the resulting corner kick and finds Leo
Santos (Nacional), who jumps highest and
tries his luck with a header from around
the penalty spot. His effort is both strong
and precise enough to go into the bottom
right corner. The score changes to 1:0.

Bruno Jose Costa shows a yellow card to
Pablo Ruan (Nacional) for his blatant foul.

Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) goes into
the book for bad language. His vulgar comments
could have made it worse. Luckily for him,
it's a yellow card.

Hidemasa Morita (Sporting Lisbon) doesn't
have to suffer any longer with the painful
injury as Giorgi Kochorashvili comes onto
the pitch to replace him.

Pablo Ruan (Nacional) makes a bad challenge
and is given a second yellow card which
means he's off.

Half-time substitution. Tiago Margarido
decided to make a change. Chiheb Labidi
is replaced by Filipe Soares (Nacional).

Stunning strike! Pedro Goncalves (Sporting
Lisbon) latches on to a precise through
ball from Luis Suarez before unleashing
an unstoppable shot into the roof of the
net from the edge of the area. Fantastic
goal. The score is now 1:1.

Paulinho Boia (Nacional) has tested the
patience of referee Bruno Jose Costa and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Ricardo Mangas (Sporting Lisbon) is shown
a yellow card for a late challenge.

Ivan Fresneda will be replaced by Georgios
Vagiannidis (Sporting Lisbon).

Rui Borges has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Geovany Quenda (Sporting Lisbon)
replacing Ricardo Mangas.

Celebrations are cut short for Sporting
CP as the referee indicates NO GOAL after
the VAR review shows it was offside!

Tiago Margarido has decided to make a change.
Lucas Joao (Nacional) replaces Jesus Andres
Ramirez Diaz.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Paulinho Boia trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Witi (Nacional).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Joel Silva (Nacional) is replacing Liziero.

Goal! Goncalo Inacio pulls the ball back
for Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) on
the edge of the box, and he beats the keeper
with a fine strike into the bottom left
corner. 1:2.

Here is a change. Geny Catamo is going off
and Rui Borges gives the last tactical orders
to Conrad Harder (Sporting Lisbon).

Goal Conrad Harder (Sporting Lisbon)! Conrad
Harder (Sporting Lisbon) was put through
by Pedro Goncalves and he showed brilliant
composure inside the box to fire into the
bottom left corner. 1:3.

A substitution has been made. Matheus Dias
goes off and Watts (Nacional) comes on.

Goal! Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon)
neatly controls a decent pass from Luis
Suarez. He looks up and smashes an unstoppable
drive into the bottom right corner from
the edge of the box. 1:4.

Gabri Veiga takes over corner duties and
expertly finds Victor Froholdt (FC Porto),
who jumps highest and coolly plants a bullet
header into the left side of the goal. The
score is now 0:1.

Samu (FC Porto) is being substituted because
of an injury. Francesco Farioli sends Luuk
de Jong on the pitch.

Diogo Costa (FC Porto) is booked for saying
more than Ricardo Baixinho was willing to
tolerate.

Pablo (Gil Vicente) makes a bad challenge
and receives a yellow card. The referee
had no doubt.

Gabri Veiga (FC Porto) was probably a bit
loose with his words to Ricardo Baixinho,
who decides to show him a yellow.

Goal! Zaidu puts a cross into the box and
finds Pepê (FC Porto), who latches on to
it and strikes the ball into the middle
of the net. He makes it 0:2.

Yellow card. Alan Varela (FC Porto) goes
into the referee's book after a bad challenge.

Substitution. Agustin Moreira (Gil Vicente)
on for Martin Fernandez.

Ze Carlos is substituted due to injury.
Cesar Peixoto gives a chance to Santiago
Gonzalez Garcia (Gil Vicente).

Borja Sainz (FC Porto) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Ricardo Baixinho had an
easy-decision to make.

Substitution. Borja Sainz did his best and
is replaced by William Gomes (FC Porto).

Francesco Farioli has decided to substitute
Gabri Veiga and he is replaced by Stephen
Eustaquio (FC Porto).

Agustin Moreira (Gil Vicente) is shown a
yellow card after a horrible tackle.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Gustavo Varela (Gil Vicente)
replaces Facundo Caseres.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Jose Pedro (FC Porto)
comes onto the pitch so that Pepê can be
given a rest.

Francesco Farioli has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Rodrigo Mora (FC Porto)
replacing Alberto Costa.

Substitution. Santos Hevertton is replaced
by Ze Carlos (Gil Vicente).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rodrigo Rodrigues (Gil Vicente)
comes onto the pitch for Pablo.

Goal! Ricardo Mangas (Sporting Lisbon) picks
up the ball from a rebound and from the
edge of the box he unleashes a shot into
the middle of the net. Joao Valido is unable
to keep the ball out of the net. It's 1:0.

Dylan Nandin (Arouca) knows very well what
he has done, despite his innocent look,
and the referee sends him off the pitch
with a straight red!

Goal! Joao Valido gets a hand on the penalty
from Luis Suarez (Sporting Lisbon), but
can't stop it from flying into the bottom
left corner.

Goal! Goncalo Inacio plays a short, square
pass into the path of Trincao (Sporting
Lisbon), who bends a shot straight into
the right side of the goal to make it 3:0.
Fabulous goal!

Rui Borges makes a switch. Georgios Vagiannidis
is coming on in place of Ivan Fresneda (Sporting
Lisbon) at the start of the second period.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Vasco Seabra probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Hyunju
Lee. He is replaced by Tiago Esgaio (Arouca).

Goal - 4:0! Georgios Vagiannidis laid the
ball off to Ricardo Mangas (Sporting Lisbon),
who shot from close range into the bottom
left corner, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

A substitution has been made. Geny Catamo
goes off and Geovany Quenda (Sporting Lisbon)
comes on.

Luis Suarez (Sporting Lisbon) receives a
well-taken defence-splitting low pass inside
the box and scores! His great effort goes
under the crossbar and into the net.

Alfonso Trezza comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Mateo Flores (Arouca).

Vasco Seabra prepares a substitution. Nais
Djouahra is replaced by Ivan Barbero (Arouca).

Pedro Goncalves goes off the pitch and Conrad
Harder (Sporting Lisbon) comes on.

That will be all from Hidemasa Morita who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Giorgi
Kochorashvili (Sporting Lisbon).

Stunning strike! Trincao (Sporting Lisbon)
latches on to a precise through ball from
Geovany Quenda before unleashing an unstoppable
shot into the back of the net from the edge
of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is
now 6:0.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Puche (Arouca) replaces
Alex Pinto.

A substitution has been made. Amadou Dante
is replaced by Arnau Sola (Arouca).

Rui Borges has decided to substitute Luis
Suarez and he is replaced by Alisson Santos
(Sporting Lisbon).

Diego Rodrigues (Braga) takes a great first
touch to control a killer pass on the edge
of the box and produces a low drive that
goes into the middle of the goal.

Ricardo Horta (Braga) receives the ball
inside the box, reacts quickly and without
any problems stabs the ball under the crossbar.

Miguel Nogueira shows a yellow card to Chiquinho
(Alverca) for his blatant foul.

Goal! Amine El Ouazzani (Braga) puts the
ball into the bottom right corner past the
outstretched arm of Andre Gomes.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Vitor Carvalho (Braga) was quite harsh
and Miguel Nogueira didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Naves (Alverca) has tested the patience
of referee Miguel Nogueira and goes into
the book for a previous late challenge.

The referee signals a substitution. Gustaf
Lagerbielke (Braga) is brought on as a substitute
for Paulo Oliveira.

Carlos Vicens prepares a substitution. Vitor
Carvalho is replaced by Victor Gomez (Braga).

Here comes a substitution. Davy Gui (Alverca)
is brought on as a substitute for Cedric
Nuozzi.

Custodio has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Nabil Touaizi (Alverca) replacing
Goncalo Esteves.

Substitution. Gorby walks off the pitch
and Mario Dorgeles (Braga) comes on as a
substitute.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez
(Braga) comes onto the pitch for Ricardo
Horta.

Custodio decides to make a substitution.
Marezi will be replaced by Tiago Rafael
Fernandes Leite (Alverca).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Sandro
Lima (Alverca) for Chiquinho.

Custodio has decided to substitute Amorim
and he is replaced by Diogo Martins (Alverca).

Substitution. Pau Victor makes way for Gabri
Martinez (Braga).

The foul by Joao Gastao (Estrela da Amadora)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Helder Carvalho.

Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) is awarded a
yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem
to agree with the decision, but Helder Carvalho
ignores the protests.

Helder Carvalho shows a yellow card to Atanas
Chernev (Estrela da Amadora) for a tough
tackle.

Vangelis Pavlidis (Benfica) makes no mistake
from the penalty spot after waiting for
Renan Ribeiro to move before rolling the
ball into the middle of the goal!

Enzo Barrenechea (Benfica) gets a yellow
card. The referee Helder Carvalho made the
right call.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Ianis Stoica (Estrela
da Amadora) will replace Joao Gastao.

Luis Silva prepares a substitution. Alan
Godoy is replaced by Kikas (Estrela da Amadora).

Substitution. Andreas Schjelderup makes
way for Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica).

Luis Silva has decided to substitute Fabio
Ronaldo and he is replaced by Rodrigo Pinho
(Estrela da Amadora).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Jorge Meireles (Estrela da Amadora) is replacing
Abraham Marcus.

Luis Silva has decided to make a change.
Joao Resende (Estrela da Amadora) replaces
Sidny Cabral.

Helder Carvalho shows a yellow card to Richard
Rios (Benfica), who isn't surprised as the
tackle was really hard and late.

Substitution. Florentino (Benfica) on for
Enzo Barrenechea.

Here is a change. Franjo Ivanovic is going
off and Bruno Lage gives the last tactical
orders to Leandro Barreiro (Benfica).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Vangelis Pavlidis departs
the field of play to be replaced by Henrique
Araujo (Benfica).

Tiago Gouveia comes onto the pitch because
Richard Rios (Benfica) simply cannot continue
any longer after picking up an injury.

Rodrigo Pinho (Estrela da Amadora) sees
a yellow card from Helder Carvalho after
he sent one of the opposing players to the
ground.

It's in the back of the net! Borja Sainz
slips the ball through to Pepê (FC Porto),
and he darts into the box to unleash a magnificent
shot into the bottom right corner. He makes
it 1:0.

Tiago Silva (Vitoria Guimaraes) receives
a yellow card from the referee, but it seems
like a very harsh decision.

Goal! Samu (FC Porto) ran onto a clever
lofted pass from Alberto Costa and easily
beat the keeper with a header into the bottom
left corner from close range. 2:0.

Maga (Vitoria Guimaraes) violates the laws
of the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

Francesco Farioli is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Martim Fernandes (FC Porto)
suffers an injury and Zaidu comes on.

Luis Pinto decides to make a substitution.
Oumar Camara will be replaced by Telmo Arcanjo
(Vitoria Guimaraes).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Nelson Oliveira (Vitoria
Guimaraes) replaces Nuno Santos.

Jan Bednarek is substituted due to injury.
Francesco Farioli gives a chance to Dominik
Prpic (FC Porto).

Francesco Farioli has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Stephen Eustaquio (FC Porto)
replacing Gabri Veiga.

Substitution. William Gomes (FC Porto) has
come on for Borja Sainz.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Maga will be replaced by Orest Lebedenko
(Vitoria Guimaraes).

Here is a change. Gustavo is going off and
Luis Pinto gives the last tactical orders
to Alioune Ndoye (Vitoria Guimaraes).

Goal! A rebound wrong foots everyone except
Samu (FC Porto), and he slams the ball into
the open net from close range. 3:0.

This is a yellow card! William Gomes (FC
Porto) is not happy with the decision, but
from our point of view it was clear.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Samu walks off the pitch to be replaced
by Luuk de Jong (FC Porto).

Nelson Oliveira (Vitoria Guimaraes) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Antonio
Nobre had an easy-decision to make.

Vitor Carvalho (Braga) meets the corner
and displays his eye for goal as he coolly
plants a header from close range into the
left side of the goal. The score is 1:0.

Goal! Leonardo Lelo puts the ball on a plate
for Pau Victor (Braga), who scores with
a simple close-range finish. It's 2:0.

That will be all from Paulo Oliveira who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Gustaf
Lagerbielke (Braga).

Carlos Vicens has decided to substitute
Pau Victor and he is replaced by Ricardo
Horta (Braga).

The goal by Tondela won't count as it has
been disallowed due to offside on the advice
of the video assistant referee!

Yarlen goes off the pitch and Xabier Huarte
(Tondela) comes on.

Ivo Vieira has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Afonso Rodrigues (Tondela) replacing
Helder Tavares.

Substitution. Gorby did his best and is
replaced by Victor Gomez (Braga).

Here is a change. Ismael Gharbi is going
off and Carlos Vicens gives the last tactical
orders to Sandro Vidigal (Braga).

Today's referee Claudio Pereira rightly
decides to book Roger (Braga) for his harsh
tackle.

Juan Rodriguez (Tondela) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Miro.

Ivo Vieira decides to make a substitution.
Cicero will be replaced by Yefrei Rodriguez
(Tondela).

The foul by Joao Ricardo Silva Afonso (Tondela)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Claudio Pereira.

Claudio Pereira shows a yellow card to Brayan
Medina (Tondela) for a tough tackle.

Goal! Ricardo Horta (Braga) wins the battle
of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty
past Bernardo into the bottom left corner.

Carlos Vicens prepares a substitution. Roger
(Braga) is replaced by Mario Dorgeles.

A substitution has been made. Pedro Maranhao
is replaced by Milama Moudjatovic (Tondela).

A yellow card for a tackle by Yefrei Rodriguez
(Tondela). Claudio Pereira doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Joao Pedro Goulart Silva (Casa Pia) commits
a foul and is shown a yellow card without
any hesitation from the referee.

Gustavo Correia shows a yellow card to Cassiano
(Casa Pia) for a tough tackle.

Gustavo Correia shows the yellow card to
Rafael Brito (Casa Pia) for a heavy challenge.

It's a goal! Trincao (Sporting Lisbon) shows
off his superb ability as he volleys the
ball from inside the box into the right
side of the target. The assist goes to Pedro
Goncalves and the score changes to 0:1.

Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) has too
much to say to the referee and receives
a caution.

Rui Borges is forced to make a change. Maximiliano
Araujo (Sporting Lisbon) is not able to
carry on due to injury. He is replaced by
Ricardo Mangas.

Renato Nhaga (Casa Pia) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Rafael Brito.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Joao Pedro Goulart Silva walks off the
pitch to be replaced by Andre Geraldes (Casa
Pia).

Rui Borges prepares a substitution. Geny
Catamo is replaced by Geovany Quenda (Sporting
Lisbon).

Ousmane Diomande (Sporting Lisbon) has picked
up an injury and is replaced by Zeno Debast.

Trincao takes the resulting free kick and
sends the ball into the six-yard box, where
Morten Hjulmand (Sporting Lisbon) has an
easy task to slot the ball into the back
of the net. 0:2.

Renato Nhaga (Casa Pia) picked up a yellow
card from referee.

Substitution. Miguel Sousa (Casa Pia) replaces
Fahem Benaissa-Yahia.

Joao Pereira has decided to substitute Gaizka
Larrazabal and he is replaced by Max Svensson
(Casa Pia).

Substitution. Conrad Harder (Sporting Lisbon)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Pedro
Goncalves walks off.

It is time for a substitution. Giorgi Kochorashvili
(Sporting Lisbon) is on for Hidemasa Morita.
